title: Clear Music License for a Movie Trailer
description: A marketing team wants to use a popular song in a new movie trailer. An agent must secure the necessary licenses.

tasks.description: Identify the song's publishers and master recording owners.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the two separate rights holders for the song.

tasks.description: Request quotes for both a synchronization license (for the composition) and a master use license (for the recording).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits formal quote requests to both rights holders.

tasks.description: Negotiate the fees and execute the licensing agreements upon approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the approved quotes and generates the final agreements for signature.
